text:
Come on down and transform your AWS learning
and exciting

multiplayer trivia competitions
with AWS Skill Builder Trivia.

Create fun AWS trivia for any event
with your Skill Builder account.

Set up as quick and easy.
Pick from ready made questions at no cost

or upgrade to a subscription to use our
AI powered

question generator,
or add your own questions.

As a host, you'll log in to Skill Builder
to create a trivia session.

While participants can join from mobile
or desktop devices.
Earn points based on speed and accuracy.

It's perfect for testing knowledge,
finding skills
gaps, and making AWS learning fun.

AWS Skill Builder Trivia,
where learning meets competition.
